name: The Executive Wastelands
description:
Five weeks ago in the towering headquarters of Morgan, Montgomery & Malcomson’s Mortgages, Mergers, Marketing and Management, the only lift directly to the executive offices broke. Leaving the entire upper-management stranded. 

Yesterday the lift was repaired. However no one in the organisation dares to take the lift up for fear of firing... Or worse. 

M.M.&M. are now outsourcing the rescue, sending parties up to the lift and offering rewards for any management executive found - dead or alive. So far no one has returned.

The Executive Wastelands is a Corporate Hell Pointcrawl for Electric Bastionland/Into The Odd and other rules-light weirdo OSR-adjacent games. 

Included

  • A pointcrawl through a corrupted skyscraper!
  • Terrifying corporate monsters. Both literal and metaphorical! 
  • New oddities and treasures which can be exchanged for economic capital!
